docs.snippet: Laws forbidding sanctuary policies are a false fix to a concocted problem....
docs.lead_paragraph: Laws forbidding sanctuary policies are a false fix to a concocted problem.
docs.abstract: Editorial warns Senate is set to vote on whether to withhold federal law-enforcement funds to so-called sanctuary cities; blames Republicans for lying about such cities, which simply try to protect unauthorized immigrants from being deported unjustly; accuses Republicans of exploiting murder of Kathryn Steinle in San Francisco to advance legislation that is unfair to immigrants and will result in more crime and mayhem.

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Manuel Valls and the economy minister, Emmanuel Macron, are charting a more moderate course and angering the old guard as the party struggles for direction....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Manuel Valls and the economy minister, Emmanuel Macron, are charting a more moderate course and angering the old guard as the party struggles for direction.
docs.abstract: Emergence of French Prime Min Manuel Valls and Emmanuel Macron, economy minister, as leaders of country's Socialist government, despite fact that they are disliked by party's old guard, is sign of party's struggle for direction; say party needs to change in order to address country's many problems and rising appeal of far-right National Front party.

headline.main: Leaders of France’s Socialist Party Defy Its Orthodoxy
headline.print_headline: Leading French Socialists Chip Away at Socialism

docs.snippet: Chinese President Xi Jinping arrives in Britain on Monday for a state visit at the invitation of Queen Elizabeth II, the first state visit to the United Kingdom by a Chinese leader since 2005....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese President Xi Jinping arrives in Britain on Monday for a state visit at the invitation of Queen Elizabeth II, the first state visit to the United Kingdom by a Chinese leader since 2005.

headline.main: Exclusive Q&A With Chinese President Xi Jinping
headline.print_headline: Exclusive Q&A With Chinese President Xi Jinping
